branchCategory.name: Rodless Cylinder, MY2C, Mechanically Jointed - Cam Follower Guide
branchCategory.description: <p>The MY2C Rodless Cylinders with cam follower guide improves the load capacity and moment resistance compared to the MY1C. An inner seal belt runs the entire stroke length of the cylinder to maintain air pressure enhanced with a magnetic dust seal band to protect from contaminants. The cylinder and guide components can be separated to allow easy access for maintenance without having to remove the workpiece from the cylinder. Air cushions are standard and external shock absorbers are optional.</p>
